Welcome to PIRA Onlinepst Dear PIRA Client You have been provided with access to PIRA Online PIRAs comprehensive Internetbased energy library as part of the Retainer Service that your company has with PIRA Energy Group PIRA Online provides you with access to our latest reports as well as a searchable archive of past reports and additional data tables and charts Please note that your account may take up to minutes to be activated To access the online service please go to our website at wwwpiracom Once you enter the site go to the top right corner of the home page and click on Retainer Client Login to enter the Client section You will be prompted for your User Name and Password which are listed below User Name jparks Password jp NOTE These letters are casesensitive Once you have entered the Client section you have three choices for accessing your information In the center of the page we list PIRAs latest reports for those fuels sectors to which you have access eg Global Oil North American Gas Electricity and European Natural Gas on the left is an option to go directly to the most recent issue of the main reports for any of these fuel markets and at the top of the page you may select Latest to retrieve PIRA reports issued over the last days by fuel or All Reports to retrieve all PIRA reports archived and recent by fuel If you have any questions about your retainer or if you are having a problem logging on to PIRA Online please contact Client Services PIRA Energy Group Park Avenue th Floor New York NY mailto
